outputs.output_descr: The Government of Papua New Guinea received funds from Global Environment Facility to carry out the National Capacity Self Assessment project. The main objective of the project is to carry out an assessment of PNG's capacity to address global and local environmental issues, and to develop a plan for implementation of key activities to achieve capacity building needs identified, particularly those relating to PNG's obligations under the United Nations Convention on Biological Diversity, the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change and United Nations Convention on Combat Desertification.

project_descr: National Capacity-Self Assessment - Global Environment Fund, The main objective is to carry out an assessment of PNG's capacity to address global and local environmental issues.
